snippet: In selecting a group led by Michael Capasso, the board of the bankrupt opera passed over proposals including those by the Brooklyn Academy of Music and Purchase College.
abstract: Board of bankrupt New York City Opera calls for selling company's assets to group led by Michael Capasso, founder and general director of the Dicapo Opera Theater who hopes to revive the troupe.
lead_paragraph: In selecting a group led by Michael Capasso, the board of the bankrupt opera passed over proposals including those by the Brooklyn Academy of Music and Purchase College.

headline.main: Bid for New York City Opera’s Assets Wins Board’s Support
headline.print_headline: Bid for New York City Opera’s Assets Wins Board’s Support
